FunAudioLLM/CosyVoice

Multilingual text-to-speech model with zero-shot capabilities

Related repos

  • Audio language model for voice interactions
  • multilingual speech recognition and emotion detection toolkit
  • AI model for zero-shot speech editing and text-to-speech
  • Text-to-speech library with advanced models in 17 languages (legacy models in 1100+), and tools for custom voice training
  • Production-ready text-to-speech API with multiple voices and a real-time dashboard
  • open source audio model for expressive speech and voice cloning
  • Open-source 1.2B parameter AI for zero-shot voice cloning (American/British accents), emotional English TTS, cross-lingual synthesis
  • End-to-end speech-to-speech foundation model
  • open-weight text-to-speech model for fast, natural voice synthesis
